akārakapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
kārakānupalabdhitām upādāya.
tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitānumodanāpariṇāmanā kuśalamūlena bhavitavyam.  iti pratipakṣo 'dhimātramṛduḥ
subhūtir āha:
ajānakapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
jānakānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
prathamadhyānasamāpatteś ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante,
evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
asaṃkrāntipāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
cyutyupapattyanupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
avinayapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
subhūtir āha:
pratiśrutkāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
yadā punar bhagavann abhisaṃskāraḥ kalpita ity ukto bhagavatā tadā kathaṃ sa (PSP_4:171)  kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
bhagavān āha:
ghoṣodārānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
pratibhāsapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
subhūtir āha:

na ca bhagavann abhisaṃskāreṇa śakyā samyagdṛṣṭir vā niyāmo vāvakramituṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ
bhagavān āha:
udakaskandhānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
māyāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
tannimittānupalabdhitām upādāya.

asaṃkleśapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
vānuprāptuṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vānuprāptuṃ pratyekāṃ
bhagavān āha:
kleśasvabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
avyavadānapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
vā bodhim anuprāptum anuttarāṃ samyak saṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum. iti vipakṣo mṛdumadhyaḥ
kliṣṭasattvānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
acalapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
dharmadhātusthitiṃ subhūte upādāya. iti sarvajñatākārāḥ
bhagavān āha:
subhūtir āha:
virāgapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
subhūtir āha:
asthānapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
sarvadharmāvikalpanatām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
śāntapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
sarvadharmāṇām avitathatābhisaṃbodhanatām upādāya.
evam etat subhūte evam etat,
subhūtir āha:
arāgapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
rāgānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
na hy abhisaṃskāreṇa śakyā samyagdṛṣṭir vā niyāmo vāvakramituṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ
amohapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
mohāndhakāravidhamanatām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
niḥkleśapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
vā anuprāptuṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vānuprāptuṃ pratyekāṃ
bhagavān āha:
subhūtir āha:
niḥsattvapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.

bhagavān āha:
sarvadharmāsamutthānatām upādāya.

antadvayānupagamapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
sa cāpi subhūte abhisaṃskāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śūnyaka evākhyāyate,
atyantānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
asaṃbhinnapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
sarvadharmāsaṃbhedatām upādāya.
asāraka evākhyāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?

śrāvakabhūmipratyekabuddhabhūmisamatikramatām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ suśikṣito bahirdhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ
avikalpapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
avikalpānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:

iti pratipakṣo 'dhimātramadhyaḥ  sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo iha śūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā yathā yathābhisaṃskārān pratyavekṣate tathā tathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahito bhavati,
bhagavān āha:
sarvadharmāṇām avināśitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:

yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahito bhavati tathā tathāsaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.  ity arthakṣiptavipakṣasya mṛdumṛduḥ pratipakṣo 'dhimātrādhimātraḥ iti bhāvanāmārgasthāvaivartikalakṣaṇam
duṣkhapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
sarvadharmānadhyavasāyadharmayogatām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
śūnyapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
subhūtir āha:
subhūtir āha:

bhagavān āha:
sarvadharmānabhiveśatām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
alakṣaṇapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
asaṃkhyeyasya ca bhagavann aprameyasya cāparimāṇasya ca kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ?  kiṃ nānākaraṇam?
bhagavān āha:
sarvadharmānimittatām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
adhyātmaśūnyatāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
adhyātmikadharmānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
bhagavān āha:
bahirdhāśūnyatāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
bahirdhādharmānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:  adhyātmabahirdhādharmānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
asaṃkhyeyam iti subhūte yasya saṃkhyā na vidyate yaḥ saṃkhyān nopaiti,
mahāśūnyatāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
mahāśūnyatānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:  paramārthaśūnyatāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:

ātmanā ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpattavyaṃ,  pare ca caturthe dhyāne samādāpayitavyāś caturthadhyānasamāpatteś ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,  ye cānye caturthadhyānaṃ samāpadyante,  teṣāñ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.
asaṃkhyeyam iti vā apramāṇam iti vā subhūte yasya pramāṇan nopalabhyate 'tītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu,
paramārthaśūnyatānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:  saṃskṛtaśūnyatāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.  bhagavān āha:  saṃskṛtaśūnyatānupalabdhitām upādāya.
bhagavān āha:
asaṃskṛtaśūnyatānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
aparimāṇam iti subhūte yan na śakyaṃ pramātum.
atyantaśūnyatāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.  bhagavān āha:  atyantaśūnyatānupalabdhitām upādāya.
bhagavān āha:
anavarāgraśūnyatānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
anavakāraśūnyatāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
subhūtir āha:
bhagavān āha:
anavakāraśūnyatānupalabdhitām upādāya.
svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.

subhūtir āha:

bhagavān āha:

bhagavān āha:
abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatānupalabdhitām upādāya. iti mārgajñatākārāḥ
subhūtir āha:

bhagavān āha:
kāyavedanācittadharmānupalabdhitām upādāya.
samyakprahāṇapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
indriyapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
śraddhādyanupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
balapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:
pañcabalānupalabdhitām upādāya.
subhūtir āha:
bodhyaṅgapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
bhagavān āha:

subhūtir āha:

bhagavān āha:
subhūtir āha:

subhūtir āha:

subhūtir āha:
